article_title: What CMS Administrator Andrew Slavitt Should Tell Congress This Friday

article_metadata.description: Acting CMS Acting Administrator Andrew Slavitt in October 2013 (AP Photo/ Evan Vucci) On Friday, April 15, 2016, Acting CMS Acting Administrator Andrew Slavitt will testify before the House Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations. The main topic: allegations of lawless implementation of the Transitional Reinsurance program that is part of Obamacare. Here's [...]
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
